ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Alan Easley [mailto:alan1@mchsi.com] Sent: 26. september 2003 05:04 To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com Subject: [eqbards] Hello and Questions *snipped some*
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Alan Easley [mailto:alan1@...]
Sent: 26. september 2003 05:04
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hello and Questions

*snipped some*

1) What is the advantage of the Chant we get at level 30 over other direct
damage songs like Brusco's? Haven't bought it and memmed it yet but just
curious as to what it is for.

>> The level 30 chant is a DOT it lowers MR aswell.

2) Skills have been revamped. You get skills at different levels now than
all the guides say you do. And the caps seem to be different. Does anybody
here know of a good updated list of this info? Just as a for-instance,
Sense Traps and Disarm Traps is now capped at 120 as near as I can figure.

>> Id say head to the backsstage and get:
Reeds song spreadsheet. Its THE skill and song information sheet..
http://pub5.ezboard.com/ftheconcerthallbackstage

3) Is it true that mana regeneration songs and spells do absolutely nothing
to help a Bard regen mana? That nothing whatsoever except Flowing Thought
Items does?

>> Yes no mana song or KEI will help you regen mana.. Flowing Thought items
work tho! You will appriciate that when you get your 39 Charm *grin*

Musiker Silverdrum
Bertox..
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=698639


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
